body:
So for alot of peoples channel art they have there minecraft animation guy. I would really want one of these but cant download anything :( Please make me one! Btw my channel is DerpyGaming,Please make 2 of these guys, so i canput one on each side, it would be so cool!PLEASE
Please make him holding a bow, if you cant then a iron sword is ok! Or just regular

title: PLEASE make me a MC animation guy!

replies.body:
Just search for tutorials on google.
You will need Cinema 4D or Maya to animate. If you want a "guy" here is one.

replies.body: Birdy please don't spam by saying "please" just wait until someone creates you one, make one yourself, or be more specific in what you're asking. Thanks!
